Type.Name: RowActivatedHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void RowActivatedHandler(object o, RowActivatedArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the RowActivatedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the RowActivatedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the RowActivatedHandler is removed from the event.
